page-index-hero-image-alt: An illustration of a futuristic city, representing the Cloiinkcoin ecosystem.
page-index-meta-description: Cloiinkcoin is a global, decentralized platform for money and new kinds of applications. On Cloiinkcoin, you can write code that controls money, and build applications accessible anywhere in the world.
page-index-description: Cloiinkcoin is the community-run technology powering the cryptocurrency, Cloiink (CLK) and thousands of decentralized applications.
page-index-get-started-description: cloiinkcoin.com is your portal into the world of Cloiinkcoin. The tech is new and ever-evolving – it helps to have a guide. Here's what we recommend you do if you want to dive in.
page-index-get-started-image-alt: Illustration of a person working on a computer.
page-index-get-started-wallet-descriptio: A wallet lets you connect to Cloiinkcoin and manage your funds.
page-index-get-started-wallet-image-alt: Illustration of a robot with a vault for a body, representing an Cloiinkcoin wallet.
page-index-get-started-eth-description: CLK is the currency of Cloiinkcoin – you can use it in applications.
page-index-get-started-eth-image-alt: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an Cloiink (CLK) glyph in awe.
page-index-get-started-dapps-description: Dapps are applications powered by Cloiinkcoin. See what you can do.
page-index-get-started-dapps-image-alt: Illustration of a doge using a computer.
page-index-get-started-devs-description: If you want to start coding with Cloiinkcoin, we have documentation, tutorials, and more in our developer portal.
page-index-get-started-devs-image-alt: An illustration of a hand creating an CLK logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-what-is-cloiinkcoin-descripti: Cloiinkcoin is a technology that's home to digital money, global payments, and applications. The community has built a booming digital economy, bold new ways for creators to earn online, and so much more. It's open to everyone, wherever you are in the world – all you need is the internet.
page-index-what-is-cloiinkcoin-image-alt: Illustration of a person peering into a bazaar, meant to represent Cloiinkcoin.
page-index-defi-description: Today, billions of people can’t open bank accounts, others have their payments blocked. Cloiinkcoin's decentralized finance (DeFi) system never sleeps or discriminates. With just an internet connection, you can send, receive, borrow, earn interest, and even stream funds anywhere in the world.
page-index-defi-image-alt: Illustration of hands offering an CLK symbol.
page-index-internet-description: Today, we gain access to 'free' internet services by giving up control of our personal data. Cloiinkcoin services are open by default – you just need a wallet. These are free and easy to set up, controlled by you, and work without any personal info.
page-index-internet-image-alt: Illustration of a futuristic computer set up, powered by Cloiinkcoin crystals.
page-index-developers-description: Cloiinkcoin and its apps are transparent and open source. You can fork code and re-use functionality others have already built. If you don't want to learn a new language you can just interact with open-sourced code using JavaScript and other existing languages.
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: You can build a bank run by logic you've programmed.
You can create tokens that you can transfer and use across applications.
You can use existing languages to interact with Cloiinkcoin and other applications.
You can reimagine existing services as decentralized, open applications.
page-index-network-stats-eth-price-expla: The latest price for 1 Cloiink. You can buy as little as 0.000000000000000001 – you don't need to buy 1 whole CLK.
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-explaine: The number of transactions successfully processed on the network in the last 24 hours.
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-expl: The amount of money in decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, the Cloiinkcoin digital economy.
page-index-network-stats-nodes-explainer: Cloiinkcoin is run by thousands of volunteers around the globe, known as nodes.
page-index-contribution-banner-descripti: This website is open source with hundreds of community contributors. You can propose edits to any of the content on this site, suggest awesome new features, or help us squash bugs.
page-index-contribution-banner-image-alt: An Cloiinkcoin logo made of lego bricks.
page-index-tout-eth2-description: Cloiinkcoin 2.0 is a program of interconnected upgrades designed to make Cloiinkcoin more scalable, secure, and sustainable.
page-index-tout-eth2-image-alt: Illustration of a spaceship representing the increased power of Eth2.
page-index-tout-enterprise-description: See how Cloiinkcoin can open up new business models, reduce your costs and future-proof your business.
page-index-tout-community-description: Cloiinkcoin is all about community. It's made up of people from all different backgrounds and interests. See how you can join in.
page-index-tout-community-image-alt: Illustration of a group of builders working together.
page-index-nft-description: Cloiinkcoin isn't just for digital money. Anything you can own can be represented, traded and put to use as non-fungible tokens (NFTs). You can tokenise your art and get royalties automatically every time it's re-sold. Or use a token for something you own to take out a loan. The possibilities are growing all the time.
page-index-nft-alt: An Eth logo being displayed via hologram.
